wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Robbins  (born 1953) is a British Church of England priest and former British Army officer. He is bishop's chaplain to Nick Holtam, Bishop of Salisbury. He was previously the most senior military chaplain in the British Army, serving as Chaplain-General from 2008 to 2011.

response: * The Venerable Archdeacon Stephen Robbins, QHC
* Stephen Robbins (2004 to 2011); also Chaplain General from 2008 to 2011
